Current Open Payments API Endpoint

Source: R/S7_backend.R
Open.Rd

Current Open Payments API Endpoint

Temporal Open Payments API Endpoint

Open Payments API Endpoint Temporal Group

Usage

openMain(alias)

openTemp(alias)

openTempGroup(
  title = character(0),
  description = character(0),
  contact = character(0),
  rows = integer(0),
  pages = integer(0),
  fields = character(0),
  years = integer(0),
  endpoints = list()
)

Arguments

alias

<chr> endpoint alias

title

<chr> title

description

<chr> description

contact

<chr> contact name and email address

rows

<int> number of rows

pages

<int> number of pages

fields

<chr> field names

years

<int> years available

endpoints

<data.frame> endpoints

Value

An S7 <openCurr> object.

An S7 <openTemp> object.

An S7 <openTempGroup> object.

Examples

openMain("prof_cov")
#> ── Covered Recipient Profile Supplement ──
#> 
#>   The Covered Recipient Profile Supplement
#>   file contains information about physicians
#>   and non-physician practitioners who have
#>   been indicated as recipients of payments,
#>   other transfers of value, or ownership and
#>   investment interest in payment records, as
#>   well as physicians and non-physician
#>   practitioners who have been identified as
#>   principal investigators associated with
#>   research payment records published by Open
#>   Payments. This file contains only those
#>   physicians that have at least one
#>   published payment record in this cycle of
#>   the publication as of January 30, 2025.
#>   The criteria used by the Centers for
#>   Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) to
#>   determine which payment records are
#>   eligible for publication is available in
#>   the Open Payments Methodology and Data
#>   Dictionary Document. This document can be
#>   found on the Resources page of the Open
#>   Payments website
#>   (https://www.cms.gov/OpenPayments/Resources).
#>   The Methodology and Data Dictionary
#>   Document also includes information on the
#>   data collection and reporting methodology,
#>   data fields included in the files, and any
#>   notes or special considerations that users
#>   should be aware of.
#> 
#> • Rows 1,530,412
#> • Pages 3,061
#> • Fields 32
#> 
#> • Modified ❯ 2025-01-30
openMain("prof_phys")
#> ── Physician (Distinct) Profile Information ──
#> 
#>   This dataset is pre-filtered based on the
#>   most frequent searches of Open Payments
#>   data.
#> 
#> • Rows 1,528,054
#> • Pages 3,057
#> • Fields 33
#> 
#> • Modified ❯ 2025-01-30
openMain("prof_info")
#> ── Profile Information ──
#> 
#>   This dataset provides profile information
#>   to display on payment search results.
#> 
#> • Rows 1,534,695
#> • Pages 3,070
#> • Fields 20
#> 
#> • Modified ❯ 2025-01-30
openMain("prof_map")
#> ── Provider Profile ID Mapping Table ──
#> 
#>   Maps secondary/duplicate provider profile
#>   IDs to the primary ID in the Open Payments
#>   system. For multiple reasons, a small
#>   number of providers have more than one ID
#>   in the payments records.
#> 
#> • Rows 2,358
#> • Pages 5
#> • Fields 2
#> 
#> • Modified ❯ 2025-01-30
openMain("prof_entity")
#> ── Reporting Entity Profile Information ──
#> 
#>   This dataset is pre-filtered based on the
#>   most frequent searches of Open Payments
#>   data.
#> 
#> • Rows 2,843
#> • Pages 6
#> • Fields 9
#> 
#> • Modified ❯ 2025-01-30
openMain("prof_teach")
#> ── Teaching Hospital Profile Information ──
#> 
#>   This dataset is pre-filtered based on the
#>   most frequent searches of Open Payments
#>   data.
#> 
#> • Rows 1,440
#> • Pages 3
#> • Fields 12
#> 
#> • Modified ❯ 2025-01-30
openMain("dashboard")
#> ── Summary Dashboard - all Years ──
